communication_style.preference: Hybrid (mostly async, with synchronous sync‑calls for urgent matters)
communication_style.average_response_time: Within 2 business hours for async messages, immediate for chat during core hours

work_habits.meeting_preferences: Limits scheduled meetings to 4 hours per week; prefers short (15‑30 min) stand‑ups and uses video only when necessary
work_habits.work_environment: Hybrid (3 days remote, 2 days in office)
work_habits.focus_time_requirements: Blocks 3‑4 hours of uninterrupted focus time each workday

personality.decision_making_approach: Data‑driven with a bias toward quick, decisive action; seeks stakeholder input but owns final call
personality.risk_tolerance: Moderate‑high (comfortable piloting new sales tactics, avoids reckless gambles)
personality.collaboration_style: Goal‑oriented; enjoys cross‑functional brainstorming but keeps discussions tightly scoped
personality.stress_management_approach: Uses time‑boxing, short walks, and Pomodoro breaks; practices mindfulness 2‑3 times weekly
personality.conflict_resolution_style: Direct but diplomatic; addresses issues early, focuses on facts and mutually beneficial outcomes

availability.timezone_and_working_hours: CST, core hours 08:00‑16:00 with 1 hour lunch break
other_commitments: Quarterly MBA alumni networking (2‑3 hrs per quarter)
Local tech meetup speaker (6 hrs per year)
availability.travel_flexibility: Up to 25% travel (≈5 days per quarter) for client meetings and industry conferences

personal_factors.health_considerations: Mild seasonal allergies; uses standing desk to avoid back strain
personal_factors.career_motivation: Aiming for Senior Account Executive → Sales Director within 3‑4 years; driven by revenue impact and mentorship opportunities

collaboration.meeting_frequency_preference: 1‑2 structured meetings per week; ad‑hoc syncs limited to 15 minutes
communication_channels_preference: Synchronous: Zoom for quick video calls
collaboration.feedback_style: Direct but constructive; provides data‑backed observations and actionable suggestions
collaboration.knowledge_sharing_habits: Writes concise post‑mortem summaries in Confluence; runs monthly 30‑minute “Wins & Learnings” huddles

potential_bottlenecks: High meeting load during product launch weeks
Dependency on a single senior sales engineer for technical demos
risk_factors.backup_person_needed: Jordan Lee (Senior AE, familiar with Rebecca’s accounts)
burnout_risk_factors: Extended periods of back‑to‑back client demos
